From the New York Times-bestselling hosts of the hit The Last Podcast on the Left and Black Hammer's David Rub√≠n comes this all-new humorous, horror, and action-packed comic book series that's Near Dark meets Ocean's Eleven. Hex and Steve head to an underground vampire market to meet a street-smart creature who gives them advice about their hunt for the magical relic that can cure them of their monstrousness.
